description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: General Surgery Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify in Medical Malpractice Case
cases.description: The U.S. District Court of Puerto Rico ruled that Plaintiff's General Surgery Expert Witness was excluded as he merely summarized existing records.

cases.title: Information Technology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify Regarding Class Action Damages
cases.description: An Information Technology Expert Witness was allowed to testify even if his conclusions were not based on specific data.

cases.title: Appraisal and Valuation Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Breach of Warranty Case
cases.description: The Northern District of Indiana court ruled that an Appraisal and Valuation Expert Witness could testify as to the value of an RV as he had been in the business for more than 50 years.
